title: can't login in
body:
since updating to the most recent patch i havnet been able to log in. 
keeps going to the connection error message

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems establishing a connection with our authentication servers.  Check out our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help you get this all fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i have tried all those. so im not sure what to do anymore
